body.en:
Proudly Present Manufacturing X Preimum Certificate

In Mind MX platform is now SAP certified Application. This honorable certificate proves the cloud readiness, security and integration aspect of the Product.

Custom Layout Summary

For most manufacturers, the product models are often designed initially for R&D and production purposes. Hence, product models are not sales friendly. IMC introduces Custom Layout feature which enables users to reorganize the product configuration view information to more sales friendly. This information comprises of Group, subgroup, the position of the group, the position of subgroup, dynamic attributes, and their positions, etc. The model can be either coming from ERP or defined in MSP and it applies for both configurable and classified products.

Custom Layout UI Control 

At the same time, the enhancement also provides the ability to restrict the characteristic length as defined in ERP or MSP. And it introduced a few new custom UI control, too.

Some of new custom UI controls like:

  • Number selector
  • Single Value Select Radio Box (Including Boolean selector for string)
  • Multi-Value Select Check Box

title.en: New Feature - Fluid View of Configurator

body.en:
Fluid View of Configurator 

The Fluid View feature is to adjust the width of the characteristic field based on the length of the characteristic value to utilize space. Hence, each row can potentially have more characteristics to be displayed.

Under the custom layout, users have the option to enable the fluid view. Important: fluid view works independently of the custom layout.

System Usage Summary

MSP provides two reports to analyze the user login summary and object creation summary within a certain duration.

In order to see the user login summary graph, go to “Administration->User Management->Logins”. Two options are provided: “Total Logins” and “Total Login Duration”

Total Logins

“Total Logins” is the total number of successful logins to the system grouped by the User ID. The following screenshot shows the total logins between Apr 28, 2019, to May 4, 2018. The graph can be exported into a CSV file.

 

 

Total Duration (Min)

“Total Duration” is the total number of minutes that user stays in the system. It records from user session start time to the user session end time or session expiration time. Once the server is stopped, the system will update the session end time automatically if any active session exists. The following screenshot shows the total login duration for users in minutes from Apr 28, 2019, to May 4, 2019. The graph can be exported into a CSV file.

 

Object Creation Usage Summary

In order to see the object creation summary graph, go to “Administration->User Management->Usages”. Three options are provided such as “Account”, “Opportunity/Lead” or “Quote”.  This graph shows the total number of objects (Account/Opportunity/Quote) created per user within a certain duration. The following screenshot shows the total number of quotes created per user between Jan 27, 2019, and Map 4, 2019. The graph can be exported to CSV file.

AutoCAD Enhancement Summary

AutoCAD integration further supports groovy script enabled ability to define arbitrary grouping for the generated drawing pages.

In addtion, for each group, all pages in the group can be downloaded together as a single merged PDF file, or as a zip file containing all the DWG files.

The PDF files for each group can also be selected directly while printing quote proposal.

title.en: Group Profile and UI customization Enhancement

body.en:
Group Profile to hide group/subgroup Summary

In 1811 release, MSP already supports hide of DA (Dynamic Attribute) and its values using DA Profile. In 1902 release, IMC further enhance this concept to be more powerful in the sense that any quote data point can be used to be the dimensions to hide and this can be defined in the lookup table. Now in 1904 release, IMC further extend the capability to also support hiding of DA group and its subgroups using GroupProfile.

 

UI label customization

IMC further enhance UI customization tool to allow the administrator to rename any UI label on the screens.

Existing file based customizations are still supported though deprecated.

title.en: Account Data Sync, Related product group, Audit Enhancements

body.en:
Account Data Sync from ERP

From 1904 release, MSP supports synchronizing the account data from ERP. This includes basic account data, its addresses, and sales area information. Below are some of the synced data points:

  • Currency
  • Language
  • Country
  • Country Region
  • Sales Org
  • Distribution Channel
  • Division
  • Sales Office
  • Inco Terms
  • Payment Terms

 

Related product group

In 1904 release, IMC introduced the Group Hierarchy Concept to group the related products for better navigation. It is also designed to have unlimited level of groups. Data is matained directly in MSP’s Lookup Table and hence can be manually uploaded or synchronized from ERP.

Audit feature enhancement 

Audit feature is enhanced as below:

  • Entry of Audit Query Service is moved from Lookup Tables to be under Administration, making it accessible directly and only accessible by user with administration permission.
  • Allow user to search with all the columns available or choose a specific column from a drop-down list
  • Support wildcard search using the symbol ‘*’
  • Improve the readability of the audit record by
    • Shortening the URI (i.e. only showing the first 6 characters of the URI’s fragment) on Subject, Old Value, and New Value
    • Appending the objectName in front of it if the URI has objectName

Allowing the user to click on the control which will open a new tab showing the detail of the object and a copy URI button is provided to copy the full URI to clipboard.

title.en: Lookup Table and IMC Script Enhancments

body.en:
Lookup Tables enhancement 

To improve the manageability and traceability of Lookup Tables, they can now have a description, last updated by user and last updated date. The description is editable post lookup table activation. It also has a header showing these details. Lookup Tables list view also shows these columns and user can customize it using table customizer.

 

IMC Script editor enhancement 

In 1902 release, Inmind introduced object locking feature for primary objects, e.g. account, opportunity, and quote. from 1904 this capability is extended  to IMC script as well. Only one user can edit a script at a time now.

If one user is making certain changes for the particular IMC script, another user won't be allowed to update on it. The lock will be only released upon script save or session timeout. 

On top of locking feature, the editor now shows last updated date and the user who did the update. In addition, the system allows the user to view the details of the script in read-only mode in case it is Active, which is not allowed previously.

1. IMC Script editor enhancement 

From 1904 release, users will see increased performance in quote opening and save. This is bought about by putting in place a new design to handle the configuration data in save and restore operations.

2. Groovy

From 1904 release, groovy interface performance is substantially improved by lazily loading the data needed in its binding and keeping a compiled copy of the script for usage in the system.

3. Quote Line Item Table

From 1904 release, MSP supports a leaner version of quote line item table that helps to load and bind faster.

4. Other enhancements

Some other enhancements in sales process were also done, these include:

  1. Address enhancement to support more data points, also sync from Cloud for Customer (CFC), including support for linking country region with CFC state.
  2. Not allowing to delete a sales org in case it is used.
  3. Guided Selling row mode answer is dropped.
  4. Check to preserve the last update date of an object in case it is updated on blank save.
  5. Linkage of sales area with quote currency defaulting and selection.
  6. Attach a file using drag and drop.
  7. Showing product sales text in product catalogue directly.
  8. New Material creation business data attributes can be defaulted using new material item custom mapping.
  9. Extending the account filter extension point.
  10. Support for USA Imperial unit in google map.
  11. New UI to show the execution result of IMC Script in test mode.
  12. Account Group is synchronized from CFC.
  13. Sales Item now has 15 data and 1 relation to the additional attribute.
  14. Business Type Time Zone is no longer cached.
  15. Any sales item touched by IMC Script will be evaluated in the BOM explosion.
  16. Added a global queue for AutoCAD drawing generation, due to Autodesk’s processing quota limit
